General.Name: Park & Bellheimer AG
General.Description: Park & Bellheimer AG manufactures and sells beer and non-alcoholic beverages in Germany. It offers beer, mixed beer, soft drinks, and mineral water under the Park, Bellheimer, Valentins Weissbier, Rheingönheimer, and Bellaris brand names. The company was formerly known as Parkbrauerei AG Pirmasens-Zweibrücken and changed its name to Park & Bellheimer AG in 1995. Park & Bellheimer AG was incorporated in 1888 and is based in Pirmasens, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Roald  Pauli
